Detailed Description

MetaEngine Visitor object used to retrieve a bitwise OR of Qt::WindowFlags.

The windows flags must be defined as a list of UTF-8 string types which match the window flag types, see official Qt::WindowFlags documentation for more details: http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qt.html#WindowType-enum

Example:

"window_flags": ["Popup", "Dialog"]
